types.html:
horloge biologique f (plural horloges biologiques)

  1. circadian rhythm, body clock, biological clock
    Synonyms: horloge circadienne, horloge circadienne
  2. biological clock (the progression from puberty to menopause during which a woman can bear children)
trans: circadian rhythm, body clock, biological clock
circadian rhythm, body clock, biological clock
circadian rhythm, body clock, biological clock
circadian rhythm, body clock, biological clock

title: horloge biologique
